# Reliant AI

> Houston's premier custom web design agency. We build hand-coded React and TypeScript websites for small businesses.

## About

Reliant AI is a Houston-based web design agency founded by Douglas Mitchell. We specialize in custom-coded websites for metal fabrication, oilfield services, home services, and medical/healthcare businesses. Every site is built from scratch using React, TypeScript, and Three.js â€” no WordPress or Wix templates. 150+ completed projects, 98% client satisfaction rate, 90+ PageSpeed scores.

## Services

- Starter Package ($2,500): 5-page custom website, mobile-responsive, basic SEO
- Professional Package ($5,500): 10-page site with GSAP animations, CMS integration, advanced SEO
- Enterprise Package ($12,000+): Unlimited pages, 3D elements via Three.js, custom functionality
- Monthly Maintenance: Starting at $199/month for security updates, backups, and content changes

## Industries Served

- Metal Fabrication: Equipment galleries, quote request systems, capability showcases
- Oilfield Services: Safety certification displays, fleet management, compliance documentation
- Home Services: HVAC, plumbing, electrical with online booking and service area maps
- Medical/Healthcare: HIPAA-compliant patient portals, appointment scheduling
